column4: damn, I just screwed something up. I've got a flash disk, and I pulled it out after the icon mounted itself on the desktop. But when I put it back in, I get two icons. Should I take it out, sudo rm the icons, and put it back in? And then how would I go about using the Linux version of "Safely Remove Hardware"? I'm going to guess it's unmount in the terminal. Anyways, sorry for the long post.
As for the safely remove, you can Right click the drive in Nautilus and click Unmount.
Isn't naulilus for running a command?
I personally forget which one's a PM and what's on the channel, so I use either or.
